overview: A strange festival in the middle of the night that a wandering 14-year-old girl, "Hanbyeol" experiences.  On her 14th birthday, "Hanbyeol" who was angry at her mother who didn’t send a text message far from congraturations, ran away from home that evening.  The moment she ran into a girl leading a group of goblins in a strange alley that she unknowingly entered, She see an familiar memory...
title: Meet Again
